The query succeeded but the server error '43' was expected (query: EXPLAIN AST SELECT now() + CAST(toFixedString(materialize(toNullable('1')), 1), 'IPv6'); -- {serverError ILLEGAL_TYPE_OF_ARGUMENT}).
